head.title: All Warm And Cozy, Angeleno Style

hedline.hl1: All Warm And Cozy, Angeleno Style

abstract.p: Comment on fireplace equipment designed by Conmoto, German company (Currents); photo (S)

block.p: It does get cold here -- cold enough to light fires. For stoking fires stylishly, Larry Schaffer, who has a housewares store called OK, sells a range of fire irons designed by Conmoto, a German manufacturer. A stainless steel set with wood handles, below, costs $675 and comes with a stand. Other Conmoto sets, designed by Peter Maly, run from $250 to $975. Mr. Schaffer calls OK a ''warm and fuzzy'' cross between the New York shops Moss and Troy. OK, at 8303 West Third Street, is near Arp (see top left); (323) 653-3501.
